Arrow smiles and turns back to Stranato. Stranato groans and continues walk=
ing...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrp=
g@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:45 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Be=
ast Wars


  *Infectra smiles at Arrow and takes a cookie* Infectra: Thank =
you. *Infectra says to Arrow*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: T=
HECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:31 P=
M
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


    Airbomber smils.

    "So, where ar=
e we going?" Train Wreck asks, his eyes crossing. He hit himself in the hea=
d and his optics straightened out.

    "We go to join another group, be it=
 Newcomers, Predacons with Hell Beast, Predacons with Megatron, are Allianc=
e." Stranato said.

    "Yeah, but we don't know where Megatron's team are!=
" Blender put in. Stronghold stared ahead, thinking about which team would =
be best to join.

    "Anyone for a cookie?" Arrow asked.

    "You made th=
ose?" Stronghold asked.

    "Yes, I did!" Arrow said.

    "What a wuss, a=
h yes, what are they made of? Ah screw it just give me one, as long as you'=
ll shut up!" Stronghold said, he grabbed one and Arrow chuckled with deligh=
t. Blender sighed and shook his head. Airbomber laughed but then Arrow turn=
ed around in his walk and looked at him. Airbomber sighed and took a cookie=
. He did a fake chuckle. Arrow looked at Infectra and smiled...
      -----=
 Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
      To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:06 PM
      Subject: Re: Neo =
Beast Wars


      Infectra: Sure, I'll come with you. *Infectra says to Th=
e Radicons as she continues to follow them*
        ----- Original Message =
----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent:=
 Friday, July 14, 2000 9:25 PM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      =
  Airbomber looks back at Infectra and smiles.

        "We're leaving the =
Maximals, they are full of themselves are stupid, we don't want to be with =
the likes of them, won't you come with us, Infectra?" Airbomber pleaded.

 =
       "If you don't then I pity you, of course." Stranato said...
        =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealllizards 
          =
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 7:48 PM
     =
     Subject: Neo Beast Wars


          *Infectra looks around as she foll=
ows The Radicons hoping that they would find some excitment*
